text: Claudio Martelli (born 24 September 1943) is an Italian politician. He was the Minister of Justice from 1991 until 1993. Before, he was the Deputy Prime Minister of Italy from 1989 until 1992. He resigned as Justice Minister due to a corruption scandal.Italian minister falls victim to corruption, The Independent, February 11, 1993 In 2020, Martelli married Deputy Lia Quartapelle. ==References== Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:MEPs for Italy Category:Politicians from Lombardy Category:Italian journalists Category:Italian academics
